item.description:
Downward Doggin' on Sunday's - 

Hey yoga lovers, both Newbies and advanced levels welcome. Have you ever wanted to try a yoga class?  Or, a yoga class...Outside?  Let us celebrate the warmer days and beautiful New England landscape by practicing yoga near the water in June!

B. Y. O. M. (Bring your own mat) - we do have a few extras for you to borrow, but let us know beforehand.

The 3 pack class will run for three Sunday mornings at Webb Memorial State Park off Route 3A in North Weymouth (plenty of parking).  It is scheduled to start on Sunday, June 5th from 10 am to 11:15 am.  All the yoga sessions will be on the first three Sundays in June (June 5th, June 12th, and June 19th)  June 26th is open for an unforeseen rain make up class.

The certified yoga instructor, Lee, has been teaching for 6 years and remains an active teacher in corporate wellness centers, YMCA, area fitness centers, among other destination tropical locations.  She enjoys making all yoga levels feel welcome and also challenges the advanced yogi.

All levels welcome, and the price for all three classes is only $25.  Please bring the full amount of money for the first class on June 5th for the full pack discount (3/$25).  If you want to attend but can't make a session, let us know - we can work something out. 

What you may want to bring with you... Yoga Mat, Water, towel, and wear comfy clothes preferably layers of clothing so if you get hot, you will be comfortable.  

If it rains, a make up session will be the following Sunday...and will be posted or sent through email a few hours beforehand.

Please RSVP to make sure there is enough people to conduct the sessions.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Downward Doggin' on Sundays
